body_html:
@apaszke I don't have concrete numbers on full test suite. But for test_cuda on devgpu, the total time went from 20s to 58s. The overall test time increase on all CUDA tests is likely much less than 3 fold because test_cuda tests are small and thus the wrapper overhead are more obvious.

Still, I think there are good reasons to get this in. The above detected leaks are good examples.

Once I fix those leaks, I will run the full suite and report the total increased time here.
